item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, April 14, 2025 at 3:05 AM UTC
item.description:

2. I bought a Mac (76 points | 52 comments)
3. Open guide to equity compensation (274 points | 143 comments)

11. Local CI. Sign off on your own work (18 points | 9 comments)

28. Wasting Inferences with Aider (111 points | 90 comments)
29. Whenever – typed and DST-safe datetimes for Python (259 points | 121 comments)
30. A balanced review of Math Academy (18 points | 12 comments)
